SAMPLE.TITLE: WHole genome analysis of Salmonella Typhimurium L-3553

SAMPLE_NAME.SCIENTIFIC_NAME: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. L-3553

SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: Extended-spectrum cephalosporin (ESC) resistant Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium (ST) has been isolated from cattle in Hokkaido, Japan since 2004.
